qas.question: How many television production studios is BYU Broadcasting Technical Operations Center home to?
How many television control rooms is BYU Broadcasting Technical Operations Center home to?
How many radio studios is BYU BYU Broadcasting Technical Operations Center home to?
Which BYU station offers content in both Spanish and Portugese?

plausible_answers.text: an HD production and distribution facility

qas.question: What is the BYU Operations Technical Center?
How many production studios is the BUY Technical Broadcasting Operations Center home to?

plausible_answers.text: three television production studios, two television control rooms, radio studios, radio performance space, and master control operations.

qas.question: What is the BUY Technical Broadcasting Operations Center home to?

context: The BYU Broadcasting Technical Operations Center is <b5_0>an HD production and distribution facility<b5_0/> that is home to local PBS affiliate KBYU-TV, local classical music station KBYU-FM Classical 89, BYU Radio, BYU Radio Instrumental, BYU Radio International, BYUtv and <a3_0>BYU Television International<a3_0/> with content in Spanish and Portuguese (both available via terrestrial, satellite, and internet signals). <a4_0>BYUtv<a4_0/> is also available <b6_0>via cable<b6_0/> throughout some areas of the United States. The BYU Broadcasting Technical Operations Center is home to <a0_0><b7_0><b8_0>three<b7_0/><a0_0/> television production studios, <a1_0><a2_0>two<a2_0/><a1_0/> television control rooms, radio studios, radio performance space, and master control operations.
